duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support in creation of databases, spreadsheets, etc., to track contracting status and creation of reports and/or PowerPoint charts using data pulled from existing systems including, but not limited to, Automated Contracting Preparation System (ACPS), Automated Business Services System (ABSS), FMSuite, and Contracting Information Database System (CIDS)
Collect data for audit and/or report requests
Interact and coordinate with Defense Financial Accounting System (DFAS) on payments
Create, retrieve and request contracting report

education_certification.credential: Master’s or Doctorate Degree in a related field and ten years of experience in the respective technical / professional discipline being performed, five years of which must be in the DoD OR,  Bachelor’s Degree in a related field and 12 years of experience in the respective technical/professional discipline being performed, five of which must be in the DoD
